author: Andy Rollins
comment: It's nice, but Bluetooth connected devices started behaving oddly (couldn't connect). Removed this and they work again. So will have to wait for an update to try it again.

reply.author: Udaltsoft
reply.content: Could you please check if the latest version improves things for you. Thank you
